type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.maven.MavenPom
type.description: Is used for generating a Maven POM file and customizing the generation. To learn about the Maven POM see: http://maven.apache.org/pom.html

method.name: getArtifactId
method.description:
Returns the artifact id for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#getArtifactId()

method.name: getConfigurations
method.description: Returns the configuration container used for mapping configurations to Maven scopes.

method.name: getDependencies
method.description:
Returns the dependencies for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#getDependencies()

method.name: getEffectivePom
method.description:
Returns a POM with the generated dependencies and the #whenConfigured(org.gradle.api.Action) actions applied.

returns:the effective POM

method.name: getGroupId
method.description:
Returns the group id for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#setGroupId(String)

method.name: getModel
method.description:
Returns the underlying native Maven org.apache.maven.model.Model object. The MavenPom object delegates all the configuration information to this object. There Gradle MavenPom objects provides delegation methods just for setting the groupId, artifactId, version and packaging. For all other elements, either use the model object or #project(groovy.lang.Closure).

returns:the underlying native Maven object

method.name: getPackaging
method.description:
Returns the packaging for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#getPackaging()

method.name: getScopeMappings
method.description: Returns the scope mappings used for generating this POM.

method.name: getVersion
method.description:
Returns the version for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#getVersion()

method.name: project
setArtifactId
setConfigurations
method.description:
Sets the configuration container used for mapping configurations to Maven scopes.

returns:this

method.name: setDependencies
setGroupId
setModel
method.description:
Sets the underlying native Maven org.apache.maven.model.Model object.
param:model

returns:this @see #getModel()

method.name: setPackaging
setVersion
whenConfigured
method.description:
Adds a closure to be called when the POM has been configured. The POM is passed to the closure as a parameter.


param:closure The closure to execute when the POM has been configured.

returns:this

method.name: whenConfigured
method.description:
Adds an action to be called when the POM has been configured. The POM is passed to the action as a parameter.


param:action The action to execute when the POM has been configured.

returns:this

method.name: withXml
method.description:
Adds a closure to be called when the POM XML has been created. The XML is passed to the closure as a parameter in form of a org.gradle.api.XmlProvider. The action can modify the XML.


param:closure The closure to execute when the POM XML has been created.

returns:this

method.name: withXml
method.description:
Adds an action to be called when the POM XML has been created. The XML is passed to the action as a parameter in form of a org.gradle.api.XmlProvider. The action can modify the XML.


param:action The action to execute when the POM XML has been created.

returns:this

method.name: writeTo
method.description:
Writes the #getEffectivePom() XML to a writer while applying the #withXml(org.gradle.api.Action) actions. Closes the supplied Writer when finished.
param:writer The writer to write the POM to.

returns:this

method.name: writeTo
method.description:
Writes the #getEffectivePom() XML to a file while applying the #withXml(org.gradle.api.Action) actions. The path is resolved as defined by org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...) The file will be encoded as UTF-8.
param:path The path of the file to write the POM into.

returns:this

property.name: artifactId
property.description:
Returns the artifact id for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#getArtifactId()

property.name: configurations
property.description: Returns the configuration container used for mapping configurations to Maven scopes.

property.name: dependencies
property.description:
Returns the dependencies for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#getDependencies()

property.name: effectivePom
property.description:
Returns a POM with the generated dependencies and the #whenConfigured(org.gradle.api.Action) actions applied.

returns:the effective POM

property.name: groupId
property.description:
Returns the group id for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#setGroupId(String)

property.name: model
property.description:
Returns the underlying native Maven org.apache.maven.model.Model object. The MavenPom object delegates all the configuration information to this object. There Gradle MavenPom objects provides delegation methods just for setting the groupId, artifactId, version and packaging. For all other elements, either use the model object or #project(groovy.lang.Closure).

returns:the underlying native Maven object

property.name: packaging
property.description:
Returns the packaging for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#getPackaging()

property.name: scopeMappings
property.description: Returns the scope mappings used for generating this POM.

property.name: version
property.description:
Returns the version for this POM.
@see org.apache.maven.model.Model#getVersion()
